article.title: Raytheon to Support New Radars and Air-Traffic Navigation Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Marlborough, Massachusetts, was awarded a $7,209,568 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for development services in support of new radars and air-traffic navigation systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
